title: So when is Tristana being reworked to a non-cancerous state?
body: No champion in the game should have two 600 range escapes PLUS flash.

replies.body: So when is Urgot being reworked into a non-sexy state? Seriously. Lady-boner whenever he pops up in champion selcct.

So when is akali being reworked to a non-cancerous state?

No champion in the game should have three 700 range gapclosers PLUS flash.
